game.name: Aooni
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: [이것이 "푸른 비극"의 기원입니다]전설적인 호러 게임 "아오오니"가 이제 Steam로 출시됩니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: [This is the origin of "Blue Tragedy"]The legendary horror game "Ao Oni" is now available on Steam!

reviewHighlights.text: A mediocre RPG Maker Puzzle game that is mostly carried by the fact that it's Ao Oni, an unintentionally funny piece of internet/indie horror history....
